Cambridge, Cambridge University Press, 2008, 8°, xvi-392 pp., 1 carte. ISBN 978-0-521-68488-0. £19.99.
19 contributions. - Part I: Contexts. - Part II: The World of the Novel. - Part III: Form. - Part IV: Reception.
